Articles.Content:
I wish I could pay Kerbal currency for other players to conduct some flight tests for me.

Edited October 15, 2016 by Jonfliesgoats

I agree. It would be great for challenges to have some sort of mission creator in which you would set destinations and objectives and then send it to someone, or provide some sort of seed for it. People would just go into the game, type it in and the mission would get created.

Edited October 15, 2016 by Veeltch
I suppose this would require some way to transfer funds and whatever results between players.

I like your idea, but to suggest an alternative you could just post said craft file in the "Spacecraft Exchange" area of the forums and request people to test it out and report back to you in exchange for likes, the "currency" of the forums.

I'm sure there are lots of people who would be willing and happy to help you out.
Cool!  I was beggin for some flight test data earlier.  I will post the request in the spacecraft exchange.
